Detailed Description

Header file for board.cc.

In this header file classes and data structures neccessary for proper moves playing and unplaying are declared.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum Playing_priority

Priority of a move.

Structure representing coordinates of one intersection.

Enumerator:
pp_high 

High priority.

pp_normal 

No special priority.

pp_low 

Low priority.

pp_pass 

Very low, passes are played very last but before ko.

pp_ko_last 

Ultra low, ko taking moves are played last.

pp_none 

Not played at all.

enum Point_status

Enum of possible values in Board_manager::Point_board.

Enumerator:
ps_at 

Attacker' stone ( safe ).

ps_uns_at 

Unsafe attacker's stone.

ps_de 

Defender's stone.

ps_pot_eye 

Potential eye.

ps_empty 

Empty point.

enum Sgf_mark
Enumerator:
sm_safe 

On coordinate there is a safe stone.

sm_playable 

It is possible to play at a coordinate.

sm_at_playable 

Playable only for attacker, not defender ( coordinates on the edge ).

sm_none 

No sgf mark.

enum Stone_color

Stone color.

Stone color is used for simple distinguishing attackers and defenders stones.

Function Documentation

Hash_key get_random_Hash_key (  ) 

Function returning random number of Hash_key type.

This type must be 64 bit

Returns:
Returns random hash key. This function is used for filling Hash_board_manager::hash_board with random hash keys ( as defined in Zobrist hashing)

Comparing operator. This operator is needed since I am storing coordinates in set - requires comparing operator
